value_i18n.ar_SA:
This campaign in a box is designed for Liferay partners to use in their lead generation efforts and contains ready-to-use marketing assets on a Solution-focused approach for a Supplier Portal.

The key theme of the Supplier Portal campaign in a box is making your suppliers and teams more efficient by meeting critical business needs in five ways: 

  • Streamline onboarding: Automate and accelerate registering, validating, and onboarding suppliers.
  • Provide a single location for communication and collaboration: Utilize a supplier portal for efficient, centralized information sharing with your suppliers.
  • Digitize and automate processes: Streamline manual processes using workflows. 
  • Empower suppliers with self-service capabilities: Provide self-service to reduce the time, effort, and costs it takes to serve and manage suppliers. 
  • Monitor and improve supplier performance: Pull data and analytics from relevant systems to evaluate supplier performance.
